statement.name: INSERT_SMAPRS
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMAPRS(nroprs, codcia, titprs, codprs, apeprs, nomprs, npqprs, nacprs, fhnprs, ideprs, nriprs, epsprs, sngprs, civprs, sexprs, dirprs, telprs, celprs, ideciu, emlprs, pswprs, expprs, eskprs, estprs, snpprs, nroxvt, psnprs, pnoprs, snoprs, papprs, sapprs) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAPRS
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAPRS SET APEPRS = ?, NOMPRS = ?, FHNPRS = ?, SEXPRS = ?, EMLPRS = ?, PNOPRS = ?, SNOPRS = ?, PAPPRS = ?, SAPPRS = ? WHERE NRIPRS = ?

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAPRS_VALD
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAPRS SET NRIPRS=?,TDIPRS=?,IDEPRS=?,CODPRS=? WHERE NROPRS = ?
